channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Leveraging Docker with TensorFlow Models & TensorFlow.js for a Snake AI Game
item.description: Learn how TensorFlow.js can be used with Docker to run AI/ML in a web browser, using a real-world example of a Snake AI game. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/leveraging-docker-with-tensorflow/

item.title: Shift-Left Testing with Testcontainers: Catching Bugs Early with Local Integration Tests
item.description: Learn how integration tests can help you catch defects earlier in the developers inner loop and how Testcontainers can make them feel as easy as unit tests. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/shift-left-testing-with-testcontainers/
